attributes.action: How dare William Haigh demand the removal of Assad when he does NOTHING to help us get rid of David Cameron.
attributes.additional_details: Here we go again, posturing and demanding the people of foreign countries be given all help - at OUR expense - to determine their future while at home that very same right is being denied the people of this country.  Do we need to take up arms, like the people of Syria to be allowed to exercise our rights, INCLUDING a referendum NOW on pulling out of the EU.  Our elected dishonourables do NOTHING at home yet play fast and loose with our money EVERYWHERE but here!
